APIApplication 
 public APIApplication()

TtaInitialize 
 public static native void TtaInitialize(String applicationName)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaInitialize Initializes the Thot editing tool kit for an application. This function must be called before any other function of the tool kit. Parameter: applicationName: the argv[0] of the application that requires services from the tool kit. This name is used for accessing the ressources defined in file .Xdefaults. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaQuit 
 public static native void TtaQuit()
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaQuit Quits the Thot tool kit. No other function of the tool kit can then be called by the application. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaSetErrorMessages 
 public static native void TtaSetErrorMessages(int on)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaSetErrorMessages Indicates to the tool kit whether error messages must be printed or not. Parameter: on: 1 if error messages must be printed, 0 if not. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetVersion 
 public static native String TtaGetVersion()
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetVersion Returns the identifier of the current version of the Thot editing tool kit. Return value: identifier of the current version. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetErrorCode 
 public static native int TtaGetErrorCode()
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetErrorCode Returns the error code set by the last call to the Thot editing tool kit. See file application.h for the possible values. Return value: last error code, 0 if the last call was successful. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetStrError 
 public static native String TtaGetStrError(int errorCode)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetStrError Returns a pointer to the message text for a given error code. Parameter: errorCode: an error code. Return value: No return value See also: TtaGetErrorCode ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaExtractName 
 public static native void TtaExtractName(String text,
                                          StringBuffer aDirectory,
                                          StringBuffer aName)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaExtractName: extracts the directory and the file name. aDirectory and aName must be arrays of characters which sizes are sufficient to contain the path and the file name. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaCheckDirectory 
 public static native boolean TtaCheckDirectory(String aDirectory)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaCheckDirectory Ckecks that a directory exists and can be accessed. Parameter: directory: the directory name. Return value: TRUE if the directory is OK, FALSE if not. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaStrdup 
 public static native String TtaStrdup(String str)
